typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Customer_Surrogate_ID as long,
		ID as long,
		HOUSEHOLD_ID as integer,
		Current_HOUSEHOLD_ID as integer,
		Current_CARD_NUMBER as long,
		CURRENT_SEGMENT_NAME as string,
		Current_CURRENT_SEGMENT_NAME as string,
		PRIMARY_CARD_FLAG as string,
		Current_PRIMARY_CARD_FLAG as string,
		CUSTOMER_NAME as string,
		Current_CUSTOMER_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS_STATUS as string,
		Current_ADDRESS_STATUS as string,
		CUSTOMER_ADDRESS as string,
		Current_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS as string,
		Current_CUSTOMER_PHONE as string,
		HOUSEHOLD_CITY as string,
		Current_HOUSEHOLD_CITY as string,
		HOUSEHOLD_POSTAL_CODE as string,
		Current_HOUSEHOLD_POSTAL_CODE as string,
		CARD_TYPE as string,
		Current_CARD_TYPE as string,
		NEW_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG as string,
		Current_NEW_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG as string,
		EMAIL_STATUS as string,
		Current_EMAIL_STATUS as string,
		Current_CARD_EMAIL as string,
		Current_ECOMM_EMAIL as string,
		SEND_EMAIL_FLAG as string,
		Current_SEND_EMAIL_FLAG as string,
		SEND_MAIL_FLAG as string,
		Current_SEND_MAIL_FLAG as string,
		TM_CARD_FLAG as string,
		Current_TM_CARD_FLAG as string,
		TM_LOCATION_NUMBER as integer,
		Current_TM_LOCATION_NUMBER as integer,
		TM_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG as string,
		Current_TM_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG as string,
		Current_CARD_ISSUE_DATE as date,
		Current_FIRST_SHOP_DATE as date,
		Current_LAST_SHOP_DATE as date,
		PRIMARY_STORE_NUMBER as integer,
		Current_PRIMARY_STORE_NUMBER as integer,
		Current_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE as date,
		Current_LAST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE as date,
		PRIMARY_ECOMM_STORE_NUMBER as integer,
		Current_PRIMARY_ECOMM_STORE_NUMBER as integer,
		HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE as date,
		Current_HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE as date,
		HHN_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE as date,
		Current_HHN_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE as date,
		HOUSEHOLD_ECOMM_TYPE as string,
		Current_HOUSEHOLD_ECOMM_TYPE as string,
		HOUSEHOLD_SHOPPING_CHANEL as string,
		Current_HOUSEHOLD_SHOPPING_CHANEL as string,
		Current_LIFETIME_POINTS_TOTAL as integer,
		Current_LIFETIME_POINTS_REDEEM as integer,
		Current_LIFETIME_SPEND as double,
		CURRENT_POINTS_BALANCE as integer,
		Current_CURRENT_POINTS_BALANCE as integer,
		Current_DATE_OF_BIRTH as date,
		Current_AGE as integer,
		Current_AGE_GROUP as string,
		LAST_CHANGED as string,
		LAST_DML as long,
		EFF_START_DT as date,
		EFF_END_DT as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		CRC_VAL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Customer
ConditionalSplit1@Active aggregate(groupBy(ID,
		IsActive),
	each(match(name!='ID'&&name!='IsActive'), $$ = max($$))) ~> RemoveDups
Customer split(IsActive == 1,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Active, Inactive)
RemoveDups, ConditionalSplit1@Inactive union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Customer_Surrogate_Id as long,
		ID as long,
		Household_Id as integer,
		Current_Household_Id as integer,
		Current_Card_Number as long,
		Current_Segment_Name as string,
		Current_Current_Segment_Name as string,
		Primary_Card_Flag as string,
		Current_Primary_Card_Flag as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Current_Customer_Name as string,
		Address_Status as string,
		Current_Address_Status as string,
		Customer_Address as string,
		Current_Customer_Address as string,
		Current_Customer_Phone as string,
		Household_City as string,
		Current_Household_City as string,
		Household_Postal_Code as string,
		Current_Household_Postal_Code as string,
		Card_Type as string,
		Current_Card_Type as string,
		New_Household_Flag as string,
		Current_New_Household_Flag as string,
		Email_Status as string,
		Current_Email_Status as string,
		Current_Card_Email as string,
		Current_Ecomm_Email as string,
		Send_Email_Flag as string,
		Current_Send_Email_Flag as string,
		Send_Mail_Flag as string,
		Current_Send_Mail_Flag as string,
		TM_Card_Flag as string,
		Current_TM_Card_Flag as string,
		TM_Location_Number as integer,
		Current_TM_Location_Number as integer,
		TM_Household_Flag as string,
		Current_TM_Household_Flag as string,
		Current_Card_Issue_Date as date,
		Current_First_Shop_Date as date,
		Current_Last_Shop_Date as date,
		Primary_Store_Number as integer,
		Current_Primary_Store_Number as integer,
		Current_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date as date,
		Current_Last_Ecomm_Shop_Date as date,
		Primary_Ecomm_Store_Number as integer,
		Current_Primary_Ecomm_Store_Number as integer,
		HHN_First_Shop_Date as date,
		Current_HHN_First_Shop_Date as date,
		HHN_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date as date,
		Current_HHN_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date as date,
		Household_Ecomm_Type as string,
		Current_Household_Ecomm_Type as string,
		Household_Shopping_Chanel as string,
		Current_Household_Shopping_Chanel as string,
		Current_Lifetime_Points_Total as integer,
		Current_Lifetime_Points_Redeem as integer,
		Current_Lifetime_Spend as double,
		Current_Points_Balance as integer,
		Current_Current_Points_Balance as integer,
		Current_Date_Of_Birth as string,
		Current_Age as integer,
		Current_Age_Group as string,
		Last_Changed as string,
		Last_Dml as string,
		Eff_Start_Dt as date,
		Eff_End_Dt as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		Crc_Val as string
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['DIM_CUSTOMER_New2.parquet'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Customer_Surrogate_ID,
		ID,
		HOUSEHOLD_ID,
		Current_HOUSEHOLD_ID,
		Current_CARD_NUMBER,
		CURRENT_SEGMENT_NAME,
		Current_CURRENT_SEGMENT_NAME,
		PRIMARY_CARD_FLAG,
		Current_PRIMARY_CARD_FLAG,
		CUSTOMER_NAME,
		Current_CUSTOMER_NAME,
		ADDRESS_STATUS,
		Current_ADDRESS_STATUS,
		CUSTOMER_ADDRESS,
		Current_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS,
		Current_CUSTOMER_PHONE,
		HOUSEHOLD_CITY,
		Current_HOUSEHOLD_CITY,
		HOUSEHOLD_POSTAL_CODE,
		Current_HOUSEHOLD_POSTAL_CODE,
		CARD_TYPE,
		Current_CARD_TYPE,
		NEW_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG,
		Current_NEW_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG,
		EMAIL_STATUS,
		Current_EMAIL_STATUS,
		Current_CARD_EMAIL,
		Current_ECOMM_EMAIL,
		SEND_EMAIL_FLAG,
		Current_SEND_EMAIL_FLAG,
		SEND_MAIL_FLAG,
		Current_SEND_MAIL_FLAG,
		TM_CARD_FLAG,
		Current_TM_CARD_FLAG,
		TM_LOCATION_NUMBER,
		Current_TM_LOCATION_NUMBER,
		TM_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG,
		Current_TM_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG,
		Current_CARD_ISSUE_DATE,
		Current_FIRST_SHOP_DATE,
		Current_LAST_SHOP_DATE,
		PRIMARY_STORE_NUMBER,
		Current_PRIMARY_STORE_NUMBER,
		Current_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,
		Current_LAST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,
		PRIMARY_ECOMM_STORE_NUMBER,
		Current_PRIMARY_ECOMM_STORE_NUMBER,
		HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE,
		Current_HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE,
		HHN_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,
		Current_HHN_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,
		HOUSEHOLD_ECOMM_TYPE,
		Current_HOUSEHOLD_ECOMM_TYPE,
		HOUSEHOLD_SHOPPING_CHANEL,
		Current_HOUSEHOLD_SHOPPING_CHANEL,
		Current_LIFETIME_POINTS_TOTAL,
		Current_LIFETIME_POINTS_REDEEM,
		Current_LIFETIME_SPEND,
		CURRENT_POINTS_BALANCE,
		Current_CURRENT_POINTS_BALANCE,
		Current_DATE_OF_BIRTH,
		Current_AGE,
		Current_AGE_GROUP,
		LAST_CHANGED,
		LAST_DML,
		EFF_START_DT,
		EFF_END_DT,
		IsActive,
		CRC_VAL
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
